mapper.update: update user set open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_1 = #{name1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_2 = #{name2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_3 = #{name3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_1 = #{phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_2 = #{phone2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_3 = #{phone3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now_place = #{nowPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_1 = #{name1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_2 = #{name2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_3 = #{name3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_1 = #{phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_2 = #{phone2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_3 = #{phone3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now_place = #{nowPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
